name: Tap-Tap Dance
description:
Play the song, tap and dance, become a music star! Rock or disco, guitar or piano - you got it all here!

Tap-Tap Dance will give you and your kids countless hours of fun. Tailored to delight all music lovers, the game delivers a solid dose of good mood.

Feel the beat and match the rhythm by tapping the colored buttons. If the perfect timing is reached - you get rewarded with “Perfect” mark and gain more points. Take the challenge and dance until the music track finish! Make sure your score is good enough to move to the next level. The more you advance through the game the faster your reactions should be.

Test your reflexes!
Hit the tones at the right time to get the highest score!
Become the ultimate hero of Tap-Tap Dance!

Tap-Tap Dance is the second of many more games, part of Waphoo’s Kids Edutainment MMO Platform.
